Author: LeshAft9#0083
Content: hmm. I know I was asking about this earlier, but I'm wondering how it verifies PIRATE chain without having KMD and even BTC also locally available. I think I need to finish reading https://developers.komodoplatform.com/basic-docs/start-here/custom-consensus-overview.html

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the notaries do

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the protocol is done so notarization is done to the destination chain first, then to the source chain so the destination notarization can be found

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that means if a normal node sees a notarization, it can conclude that the notarization is on the KMD chain. Of course, it can directly verify via SPV server if it wanted to
